item.description:
Missed the 1st Cosmic Bowling at Leo's? Went to the first event and had an awesome time? Haven't been bowling in years?

Well come on out to Leo's Metro Bowl in Peabody and have an awesome time.
We have been bowling a few times and each time this event gets more popular, and is requested as a repeat event very often.

We will meet in the lobby at the snack bar tables, then once we have all arrived we will proceed into the Glow Bowling room.

If you have never been Cosmic bowling before, it is bowling where the walls are painted in a neon paint, the alleys are lit up with lights and the music is playing.

Cost: $27.00 per hour per lane, maximum of 6 bowlers per lane. Shoe Rental is $2.50 pr.

We hope to see you at Leo's Saturday night.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: At the Snack Bar Tables in the front lobby
item.name: Cosmic Bowling Repeat Event
